  • |JSP
  • |Prop tag
  • Latest release: 0.8.14

Prop tag


Description


Locally override a global Dandelion-DataTables configuration property.


Usage

<datatables:table>
   ...
   <datatables:prop name="property.name" value="property.value" />
   ...
</datatables:table>

Reference

Name Description Value(s) Default Data source
name (required) Name of the property to override DOM/AJAX
value (required) Value of the property to override DOM/AJAX

  • Column tag

  • ExtraConf tag
  • ExtraFile tag
  • Prop tag
